articles.description: Legendary Indian opening batter Virender Sehwag recalled his hilarious conversation with Sachin Tendulkar that took place during India's 2011 ODI World Cup game against South Africa. During that match, when Sehwag kept on singing during the duo's conversation…

articles.title: Ex-India Cricketer Slams Tweet Calling MI Star Piyush Chawla 'Leggie Who Doesn't Play For His State'.. - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Piyush Chawla picked up the wickets of Manish Pandey, Rovman Powell ad Lalit Yadav, inspiring MI to their first win of the season.
articles.content: Veteran leg-spinner Piyush Chawla was on top of his powers in match 16 of the 2023 Indian Premier League (IPL) between Delhi Capitals (DC) and Mumbai Indians (MI) at the Arun Jaitley Stadium in Delhi… [+1585 chars]
